section.name: Reference
section.span: The concepts and technical details of the Hippo Site Toolkit.
section.p: This reference guide describes every aspect of Hippo Site Toolkit in detail. Here you can find information on a specific concept, configuration parameter, or component. Use it as a reference while developing your website.
For a hands-on approach, go to the Howto section to learn how to build a website using Hippo Site Toolkit step by step.

ul.li: Concepts - Learn about the concepts on which the Hippo Site Toolkit is based
Configuration - Learn how to configure the Hippo Site Toolkit 2
Components - Learn what components are available and what they do
